item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset for Celesteela
item.description:
In Pokemon GO , Trainers can capture a wide variety of different specimens, which can all be encountered through different methods, and at various levels of power. Ultra Beasts are among some of the strongest Pokemon in the game, so it's no surprise that obtaining them is usually restricted to special events, occasions, and 5-Star Raid Battles.

As part of Pokemon GO Fest 2024, which takes across June and July 2024 as part of the Shared Skies season, a handful of Ultra Beasts will be up for grabs in 5-Star Raids. Celesteela is one of these featured Pokemon, so many Trainers will be acquiring this specimen through this opportunity. Not further utilizing a beast with such potential would be a waste, so to ensure players get the most out of Celesteela in battle, the best moveset that should be equipped has been explained in the guide below.

Best Moveset For Celesteela in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , Celesteela has a Dual-Typing of Steel and Flying . Due to this Dual-Type combination, Celesteela is weak to Electric and Fire Type Pokemon or moves , yet is favorable in matchups against Pokemon of the Normal, Psychic, Steel, Grass, Bug, Poison, Flying, Fairy, and Ground Types . In addition to this, Celesteela is boosted in power when fighting in Windy and Snow weather, so if you have an opportunity to utilize Celesteela in these circumstances, Trainers should absolutely look to do so.

When equipped with the most powerful moveset combination, Celesteela will be capable of delivering approximately 12.62 damage per second and a total damage output of 438.7 before fainting in battle. This moveset combination involves Air Slash as the Fast Attack and Heavy Slam as the Charged Attack .

Best Celesteela Moveset

  • Fast Move : Air Slash
  • Charged Move : Heavy Slam

However, if Trainers are unable to go with moveset for any particular reason, such as needing a different Type of coverage in their team, lack of accessibility, or needing to tweak the combination to go up against a particular opponent, then additional moveset combinations have also been identified and explained below, including their expected damage output.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset for Nihilego
item.description:
In Pokemon GO , Ultra Beasts are some of the most powerful beings available for Trainers to capture. However, most of the time, these specimens are only available for limited-timed periods during special events and celebrations. For this reason, many Trainers often flock to these opportunities to secure such Powerful Pokemon and wish to utilize these powerhouses in battle moving forward.

Nihilego is one of the various Ultra Beasts available in Pokemon GO and is making a return during the Shared Skies season in the GO Fest 2024 event. Without a doubt, many players will be adding this Pokemon to their collection and looking to use it in various battles, such as PvP League, Team GO Rocket, Gym defense, and more. For this reason, knowing the best moveset to equip with Nihilego is important, as this will enable you to increase its power even further. Everything players will need to know about the most powerful move combination for Nihilego and other ways to boost its effectiveness in battle have been included in the guide below.

Best Moveset For Nihilego in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , Nihilego has a powerful stat spread of 249 ATK, 210 DEF, and 240 STA , and a maximum CP of 4465 . This makes Nihilego a powerhouse in battle, but there are steps Trainers can take to push Nihilego's power to the max and make him an even more effective team member.

Firstly, Nihilego is a Rock and Poison Dual-Type. This means that Nihilego will be weak to Steel, Psychic, and Water Type Pokemon and moves , and 2x weak to Ground Type Pokemon or moves. For this reason, Trainers should avoid utilizing Nihilego in these matchups when possible. However, several resistances give Nihilego the edge in matchups against Normal, Flying, Fire, Bug, and Fairy Types .

The best moveset for Nihilego is Poison Jab as the Fast Move , and Sludge Bomb as the Charged Move . With this particular combination, Nihilego will deal 16.44 damage per second , and 654.7 total damage before fainting . However, if Trainers need additional options due to not having access to this combination or needing to alter things for more Type coverage, for example, then they can find these listed below, as well as the expected damage potential for each combination of moves.

Best Nihilego Moveset

  • Fast Move : Poison Jab
  • Charged Move : Sludge Bomb

Secondary Nihilego Moveset Options

item.title: Bitlife: How to Complete the Turn Back Time Challenge
item.description:
Bitlife is a fun mobile game in which you can make characters and make all the choices about their lives, careers, and relationships. In this 2018 life sim, players can participate in exciting challenges every week. This time, it’s the ‘Turn Back Time Challenge,’ which will be live for 4 days . Check out this guide to find out how to complete the Turn Back Time Challenge in Bitlife .

How to Complete the Turn Back Time Challenge in Bitlife

This challenge has five components:

  • Be born a female in California.
  • Become a pop singer.
  • Have 2+pop albums go platinum or higher.
  • Marry an ex-boyfriend.
  • Have a best friend who identifies as gay.

How to Be Born a Female in California

First, you will have to be born as a female in California. To do that, players have to start a new life, choose female as their gender, select the USA as their country, and California as their birthplace. Furthermore, you should also choose ‘Music’ as a special talent.

How to Become a Pop Singer

Next, you will need to become a pop singer. For that, age up to eight years, and then start vocal lessons by going to the 'Activities,' selecting ‘Mind & Body,’ and selecting the ‘Voice Lessons’ option. Practice at least three times a year as you age up to 18.

Once done, go to ‘Special Careers’ and apply for ‘Solo Artist.’ And yes, make lots of friends as you age up, and give them gifts to maintain good friendships.

Have 2+ pop Albums Go Platinum or Higher

To get platinum albums in Bitlife , you can follow these steps:

  • Age up until you get a recording contract.
  • Accept the contract.
  • Age up again until your album is a hit.
  • Repeat this process to get two platinum albums.

You can also use the ‘Create an Album’ option from the occupation section.

How to Marry an Ex-Boyfriend in Bitlife

To find a boyfriend, accept date requests from friends or go to ‘Activities,’ click ‘Love,’ and choose ‘Date.’ Break up with him and then give him gifts and compliments to raise the relationship level.

Next, improve your relationship with your ex by giving gifts, compliments, and sending messages. Once your ex agrees to date again, propose and then marry using the options from the ‘Relationships’ section.

Have a Best Friend Who Identifies as Gay

For this step, increase your friendship with a friend who is gay and ask them to be your best friend. Once they accept, the challenge will be completed.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset For Guzzlord
item.description:
In Pokemon GO, Ultra Beasts are some of the rare and most powerful specimens in the game, making them highly popular among Trainers when they are available to encounter. As part of the Shared Skies Season, many different Ultra Beasts have returned as present encounters in Pokemon GO, within the GO Fest 2024 event in particular.

Guzzlord is one of several Ultra Beasts featured in 5-Star Raids during the GO Fest 2024 event. For this reason, many Trainers will be obtaining their first, or additional Guzzlord during this period. If players wish to further utilize Guzzlord in battle, then they can achieve the most effective output by pairing this Ultra Beast with the best moveset combination, which has been identified and outlined in the guide below.

Best Moveset For Guzzlord in Pokemon GO

Guzzlord is a Dark and Dragon Dual-Type in Pokemon GO , equipped with a maximum CP of 3264, and some very hefty stats at 188 ATK, 99 DEF, and 440 STA. As you can tell by these stats, Guzzlord's biggest strength is its Stamina stat, which means it will likely have a bigger HP pool than many of its opponents. However, this alone won't be enough to defeat the trickiest foes, so players will need to keep in mind both the key weaknesses and strengths of this Ultra Beast, plus the best moveset to equip.

Due to Guzzlord's Dual-Typing, this Ultra Beast has weaknesses to Dragon, Fighting, Bug, and Ice Type Pokemon or moves , and 2x weakness to Fairy Type moves or Pokemon , so Trainers should avoid these matchups when possible. In addition to this, there is a series of resistances that provide favorable matchups for Guzzlord against Pokemon of the Electric, Dark, Ghost, Fire, Grass, Psychic, and Water Types .

When equipped with the strongest moveset identified below, Guzzlord can expect to deal 14.85 damage per second and a total output of 534.6 damage before it faints in battle. However, if you are unable to access this moveset or need to alter things for a certain opponent or expected matchup, Trainers should seek to utilize one of the secondary options listed below, which have been covered in order of damage output.

Best Guzzlord Moveset

  • Fast Move : Snarl
  • Charged Move : Brutal Swing

Secondary Guzzlord Moveset Options

item.title: How To Get Glintstone Nail & Glintstone Nails Sorcery In Elden Ring Shadow Of The Erdtree
item.description:
In Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, magic players can enjoy an array of new spells to take down various enemies inhabiting the Realm of Shadow. Some spells, like the Glintstone Nail and Glintstone Nails can be purchased from Count Ymir, an NPC you can interact with.

Ymir doesn’t teach you the spells right away, but gives you a Ruins Map and a Hole-Laden Necklace . Once you complete Ymir’s request to sound a bell, you can return to him and purchase the Glintstone Nail and Nails sorceries . Let’s get to finding Ymir, fulfilling his request, and then purchasing the coveted sorceries in Shadow of the Erdtree .

Where To Find Count Ymir In Shadow Of The Erdtree

Count Ymir is located in the Catherdral of Manus Metyr in the eastern region of the map. You can get to this cathedral in two ways:

  • Clear Castle Ensis, defeat Rellana, Twin Moon Knight, and then reach Scadu Altus.
  • Skip Castle Ensis for now, travel east from the Castle Front Site of Grace, and find the Spirit Springs that take you to Scadu Altus .

Whichever way you choose to reach Scadu Altus, make sure to discover the Moorth Ruins Site of Grace , which is where the journey to finding the cathedral begins.

From the Moorth Ruins, head east to find an opening in the ruins below. Carefully descend to the bottom and follow a tunnel leading southeast towards a ladder .

Climb the ladder to reach Bonny Village . Travel northwest over two bridges to discover the Bridge Leading to the Village Site of Grace .

Follow the road north until you reach the Cathedral of Manus Metyr . Here, you can interact with Count Ymir and accept his task.

How To Complete Count Ymir’s Favor

To complete Count Ymir’s task, you must head all the way to the southern region of the map to discover the Cerulean Coast . From the Cerulean Coast Site of Grace, ride south and past the Ghostflame Dragon. Continue riding until you find the map fragment pillar. Collect the map fragment, and take an immediate left through the ruins.

Now, travel northeast to find a shoreline, and follow it all the way to reach another ruined region.

Ride north of the ruins, and once you reach its end, turn northeast, and parkour your way to find the Finger Ruins of Rhia, and the corresponding Site of Grace .

From the Finger Ruins of Rhia, ride northeast while sticking to the rocky descent along the hill. Once you’re on flat ground, ride north to find the Hanging Bell .

Sound the Hanging Bell to acquire the Crimson Seed Talisman +1 . You have now completed Count Ymir’s first task, and you can now return to him for further dialogue. Interacting with Ymir for the second time will get you the second Ruins Map (2nd) , Beloved Stardust talisman, and he will now teach you sorceries .

Glintstone Nail & Glintstone Nails Sorcery Requirements & Overview

Glintstone Nail

Glintstone Nails

Attribute Requirement

Level

Attribute Requirement

Level

Intelligence

18

Intelligence

32

You can purchase the Glintstone Nail and Glintstone Nails sorceries from Count Ymir for 12,000 runes each .

Casting the Glintstone Nail sorcery, shoots a shattering nail at the enemy. However, the Glintstone Nails fires a set of six shattering nails at the enemy. If the sorcery misses the target, it circles back, and tries to make it to the target, which makes it excellent against enemies that tend to dodge spells.
